Palm_Bay.WEJF:
WEJF is a Christian radio station licensed to Palm Bay, Florida, broadcasting on 90.3 MHz FM. The station serves the Palm Bay-Melbourne area, and is owned by Florida Public Radio, Inc. 
WEJF's programming includes Christian talk and teaching shows such as Focus on the Family, Revive our Hearts with Nancy Leigh DeMoss, Adrian Rogers, Joyce Meyer, Chuck Swindoll, and Unshackled!. WEJF also airs a variety of Christian music.
